name: Intensedebatecomments
tagline: IntenseDebate Comments for your Concrete5 site.
body:
## English
Intense Debate Comments Concrete5 Addon, permits add to your Concrete5 site intensedebate.com comments.  Please add a intensedebate.com account first to intensedebate.com.  

## Spanish: 

Intense Debate Comments Concrete5 Addon, permite agregar a su sitio los comentarios de intensedebate.com.  Por favor crear una cuenta primero en intensedebate.com.


```
$ cd your_repo_root/repo_name
$ git fetch origin
$ git checkout gh-pagesm```

### Authors and Contributors
For now only @MadelynDRC.

### Support or Contact
http://madelyndelrosario.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
